mapper.select: SELECT userid, loginname, identity, realname, sex, address, phone, pwd, position, type, available FROM sys_user WHERE loginname = #{loginname} and pwd=#{pwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (loginname, identity, realname, sex, address, phone, pwd, position, type, available) VALUES (#{user.loginname}, #{user.identity}, #{user.realname}, #{user.sex}, #{user.address}, #{user.phone}, #{user.pwd}, #{user.position}, #{user.type}, #{user.available})
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET loginname = #{req.loginname}, identity = #{req.identity}, realname = #{req.realname}, sex = #{req.sex}, address = #{req.address}, phone = #{req.phone}, position = #{req.position}, available = #{req.available} WHERE userid = #{req.userid}
